name: aspa

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description:
A fundamental premise in ExMatEx is that scale-bridging performed in
heterogeneous MPMD materials science simulations will place important
demands upon the exascale ecosystem that need to be identified and
quantified.

dependencies.name: blas
dependencies.description:
Intel Math Kernel Library. This package has been replaced by intel-
oneapi-mkl. LICENSE INFORMATION: By downloading and using this software,
you agree to the terms and conditions of the software license agreements
at https://intel.ly/393CijO.

dependencies.name: gmake
dependencies.description:
GNU Make is a tool which controls the generation of executables and
other non-source files of a program from the program's source files.

dependencies.name: hdf5
dependencies.description:
HDF5 is a data model, library, and file format for storing and managing
data. It supports an unlimited variety of datatypes, and is designed for
flexible and efficient I/O and for high volume and complex data.

dependencies.name: lapack
dependencies.description:
NVPL LAPACK (NVIDIA Performance Libraries LAPACK) is part of NVIDIA
Performance Libraries that provides standard Fortran 90 LAPACK APIs.

dependencies.name: mpi
dependencies.description:
Mvapich is a High-Performance MPI Library for clusters with diverse
networks (InfiniBand, Omni-Path, Ethernet/iWARP, and RoCE) and computing
platforms (x86 (Intel and AMD), ARM and OpenPOWER)
